sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) Once per round on the character's turn, the character may perform a Precise Aim maneuver before attempting a combat check and suffer a number of strain. The number of strain cannot exceed his ranks in Precise Aim. He then decreases the target's defense (ranged and melee) by one per strain suffered for that combat check.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Precise Aim</name> <number>TAL0001208</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 12:17:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>51cac02e2f7f1490e0f497eef699b64b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 12:17:37</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
